/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades predominantly gray and white, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents. These structures reach up towards the overcast sky, creating a sense of depth and scale. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. In the distance, a bridge arches over the street, connecting different parts of the city. The predominant colors in the image are gray, white, and green, reflecting the urban landscape of Beijing.
